name: Investigative Services Agency
tag_list: counter-intelligence, detective-and-security, corporate-investigations, private-investigations, marital-surveillance, security-services, corporate-consulting
overview:
Investigative Services Agency (ISA) is a fully-licensed Detective and Security Agency specializing in a wide range of investigative, security and protection services. The company was co-founded in 1998 by James Miller, President, and Lauren Cooper, Vice President.

ISA offers high-class professional services in the areas of:

Corporate Investigations Private Investigations Marital Surveillance Security Services Corporate Consulting

All agents are highly trained and supervised by James Miller, a renowned investigator, firearms expert, and security genius himself.

ISA provides sophisticated, professional surveillance, investigations, protection, counter surveillance, security and recovery services to businesses, professionals, and individuals. The company also specializes in providing a diverse pool of security personnel including individuals from a variety of ethnic and racial backgrounds, age groups and other criteria that best suit the needs of its clients.

More information about ISA and its services may be read at http://www.investigative-agency.com.
